mapper.insert: insert into FJB_EXAMDATE (DATEID, EXAMDATETIME, APPLYENDDATE, STATUS, CHECKBEGIN, CHECKEND, AREAID, ISZCKSFLAG, LOGINPASS, BANKINFOID, ADDRESS, PHOTOBEGINDATE, PHOTOENDDATE, APPLYBEGINDATE, DETAILDATE, ALLOWNUMS, KSDQID) values (#{dateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applyenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkbegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{iszcksflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginpass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photobegindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{applybegindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{detaildate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allownums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ksdqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update FJB_EXAMDATE set EXAMDATETIME = #{examdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLYENDDATE = #{applyenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKBEGIN = #{checkbegin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKEND = #{checkend,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREAID = #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISZCKSFLAG = #{iszcksflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOGINPASS = #{loginpass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANKINFOID = #{bankinfoid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTOBEGINDATE = #{photobegindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTOENDDATE = #{photoenddate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPLYBEGINDATE = #{applybegindate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETAILDATE = #{detaildate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALLOWNUMS = #{allownums,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KSDQID = #{ksdqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DATEID = #{dateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DATEID, EXAMDATETIME, APPLYENDDATE, STATUS, CHECKBEGIN, CHECKEND, AREAID, ISZCKSFLAG, LOGINPASS, BANKINFOID, ADDRESS, PHOTOBEGINDATE, PHOTOENDDATE, APPLYBEGINDATE, DETAILDATE, ALLOWNUMS, KSDQID from FJB_EXAMDATE where DATEID = #{dateid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DATEID, EXAMDATETIME, APPLYENDDATE, STATUS, CHECKBEGIN, CHECKEND, AREAID, ISZCKSFLAG, LOGINPASS, BANKINFOID, ADDRESS, PHOTOBEGINDATE, PHOTOENDDATE, APPLYBEGINDATE, DETAILDATE, ALLOWNUMS, KSDQID from FJB_EXAMDATE
select t.examdatetime from Fjb_ExamDate t where t.areaid = #{areaid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.status = '1' and sysdate <= to_date(t.applyenddate , 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select t.allownums from Fjb_ExamDate t where t.examdatetime = #{examdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.checkend from Fjb_ExamDate t where t.examdatetime = #{examdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select t.dateid from Fjb_ExamDate t where t.examdatetime = #{examdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(*) from Fjb_ExamDate t where t.status = '1'
